alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:36PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lake, northeastern Missoula and southeastern Flathead Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 636 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Ronan, or 17 miles southeast of Polson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Condon and Salmon Prairie. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 33 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northwestern and west central Montana.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
